name: @huddly/sdk
description: Huddly's Software Development Kit (SDK) used to interact with the camera by third-party applications
author: Huddly AS

scripts.build: npm run build-ts && npm run tslint && npm run test
scripts.build-web: npm run build-ts && npm run tslint && yarn webpack -p
scripts.publish-package: npm run build && npm run build-web && npm publish
scripts.compodoc: compodoc -w -p tsconfig.json -s -n 'huddly-sdk' -d 'docs' --minimal --customFavicon 'docs_style/assets/imgs/favicon.ico' --disableGraph --disableInternal --hideGenerator --includesName 'Additional Information'  --includes examples -a docs_style/assets -y docs_style
scripts.release:major: changelog -M && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'Updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version major && git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.release:minor: changelog -m && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'Updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version minor && git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.release:patch: changelog -p && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'Updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version patch && git push origin && git push origin --tags
